plot: The mosaic of different fates reveals its pattern across time. Jeanne confesses the secrets of her shattered youth, of her life torn between madness and love, and her middle age flowing to the rhythm of her memories.
title: Les variations
plot_es: The mosaic of different fates reveals its pattern across time. Jeanne confesses the secrets of her shattered youth, of her life torn between madness and love, and her middle age flowing to the rhythm of her memories.
plot_en: The mosaic of different fates reveals its pattern across time. Jeanne confesses the secrets of her shattered youth, of her life torn between madness and love, and her middle age flowing to the rhythm of her memories.
